GV03sb_14_u:1: om devā ha vai sattraṃ niṣeduḥ agnirindraḥ somo makho viṣṇurviśve devā
GV03sb_14_u:4: teṣām kurukṣetram devayajanamāsa tasmādāhuḥ kurukṣetram devānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:5: devayajanamiti tasmādyatra kva ca kurukṣetrasya nigacati tadeva manyata idam
GV03sb_14_u:8: ta āsata śriyaṃ gacema yaśaḥ syāmānnādāḥ syāmeti tatho eveme sattramāsate śriyaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:11: te hocuḥ yo naḥ śrameṇa tapasā śraddhayā yaiñenāhutibhiryajñasyodṛcam
GV03sb_14_u:12: pūrvo'vagacātsa naḥ śreṣṭho'sattadu naḥ sarveṣāṃ saheti tatheti
GV03sb_14_u:14: tadviṣṇuḥ prathamaḥ prāpa sa devānāṃ śreṣṭho'bhavattasmādāhurviṣṇurdevānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:17: sa yaḥ sa viṣṇuryajñaḥ sa sa yaḥ sa yajño'sau sa ādityastaddhedaṃ yaśo viṣnurna
GV03sb_14_u:18: śaśāka saṃyantu tadidamapyetarhi naiva sarva-iva yaśaḥ śaknoti saṃyantum
GV03sb_14_u:20: sa tisṛdhanvamādāyāpacakrāma sa dhanurārtnyā śira upastabhya tasthau tam devā
GV03sb_14_u:23: tā ha vamrya ūcuḥ imā vai vamryo yadupadīkā yo'sya jyāmapyadyātkimasmai
GV03sb_14_u:33: te devā abruvan mahānbata no vīro'dādīti tasmānmahāvīrastasya yo raso
GV03sb_14_u:36: tam devā abhyamṛjyanta yathā vittim vetsyamānā evam tamindraḥ prathamaḥ prāpa
GV03sb_14_u:38: yaśo'bhavadyadidamindro yaśo yaśo ha bhavati ya evam veda
GV03sb_14_u:40: sa u eva makhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ tata indro makhavānabhavanmakhavānha vai tam
GV03sb_14_u:43: tābhyo vamrībhyo'nnādyam prāyacan āpo vai sarvamannaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:46: athemam viṣṇuṃ yajñam tredhā vyabhajanta vasavaḥ prātaḥsavanaṃ rudrā
GV03sb_14_u:49: agniḥ prātaḥsavanam indro mādhyandinaṃ savanam viśve devāstṛtīyasavanam
GV03sb_14_u:51: gāyatrī prataḥsavanam triṣṭummādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jagatī tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:54: dadhyaṅ ha vā ātharvaṇaḥ etaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam vidāṃ cakāra
GV03sb_14_u:55: yathā-yathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:57: sa hendreṇokta āsa etam cedanyasmā anubrūyāstata eva te śiraścindyāmiti
GV03sb_14_u:59: tadu hāśvinoranuśrutamāsa dadhyaṅṅu ha vā ātharvaṇa etaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam
GV03sb_14_u:60: veda yathāyathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:62: tau hetyocatuḥ upa tvāyāveti kimanuvakṣyamāṇāvityetaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam
GV03sb_14_u:63: yathā-yathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavatīti
GV03sb_14_u:65: sa hovāca indreṇa vā ukto'smyetaṃ cedanyasmā anubrūyāstata eva te śiraścindyāmiti
GV03sb_14_u:66: tasmādvai bibhemi yadvai me sa śiro na cindyānna vāmupaneṣya iti
GV03sb_14_u:68: tau hocatuḥ āvām tvā tasmāttrāsyāvaha iti katham mā trāsyethe iti yadā nā
GV03sb_14_u:69: upaneṣyase'tha te śiraścittvānyatrāpanidhāsyāvo'thāśvasya śira āhṛtya tatte
GV03sb_14_u:70: pratidhāsyāvastena nāvanuvakṣyasi sa yadā nāvanuvakṣyasyatha te śiraścetsyatyatha
GV03sb_14_u:71: te svaṃ śira āhṛtya tatte pratidhāsyāva iti tatheti
GV03sb_14_u:73: tau hopaninye tau yadopaninye'thāsya śiraścittvānyatrāpanidadhaturathāśvasya śira
GV03sb_14_u:74: āhṛtya taddhāsya pratidadhatustena hābhyāmanūvāca sa yadābhyāmanūvācāthāsya
GV03sb_14_u:75: tadindraḥ śiraścicedāthāsya svaṃ śira āhṛtya taddhāsya pratidadhatuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:77: tasmādetadṛṣiṇābhyanūktam dadhyaṅ ha yanmadhvātharvaṇo vāmaśvasya śīrṣṇā pra
GV03sb_14_u:80: tanna sarvasmā anubrūyāt enasyaṃ hi tadatho nenma indraḥ śiraścinadaditi yo nveva
GV03sb_14_u:81: jñātastasmai brūyādatha yo'nūcāno'tha yo'sya priyaḥ syānna tveva sarvasmā iva
GV03sb_14_u:83: samvatsaravāsine'nubrūyāt eṣa vai samvatsaro ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u
GV03sb_14_u:86: tisro rātrīrvrataṃ carati trayo vā ṛtavaḥ samvatsarasya samvatsara eṣa ya eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:87: tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmāttisro rātrīrvrataṃ carati
GV03sb_14_u:91: amṛnmayapāyī asti vā asyāṃ saṃsṛṣṭamiva yadasyāmanṛtam vadati
GV03sb_14_u:94: aśūdrociṣṭī eṣa vai dharmo ya eṣa tapati saiṣā śrīḥ satyaṃ jyotiranṛtaṃ strī śūdraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:95: śvā kṛṣṇaḥ śakunistāni na prekṣeta necriyaṃ ca pāpmānaṃ ca nejjyotiśca tamaśca
GV03sb_14_u:98: athaiṣa vāva yaśaḥ ya eṣa tapati tadyattadādityo yaśo yajño haiva
GV03sb_14_u:99: tadyaśastadyattadyajño yaśo yajamāno haiva tadyaśastadyattadyajamāno yaśa ṛtvijo
GV03sb_14_u:100: haiva tadyaśastadyattadṛtvijo yaśo dakṣiṇā haiva tadyaśastasmādyāmasmai
GV03sb_14_u:102: āgaṃstatsadyo'nyasmā atidiśānīti śvo vaiva bhūte dvyahe vā tadātmanyevaitadyaśaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:103: kṛtvā yadeva tadbhavati tatsa dadāti hiraṇyaṃ gām vāso'śvam vā
GV03sb_14_u:105: athaitadvā āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūtebhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:109: rātrāvaśnīyāttadetadasya rūpaṃ kriyate ya eṣa tapati tadu hovācāsurirekaṃ ha vai
GV03sb_14_u:110: devā vrataṃ caranti yatsatyam tasmādu satyameva vadet
GV03sb_14_u:112: sa vai sambhārāntsambharati sa yadvā enānitthāccetthācca sambharati
GV03sb_14_u:113: tatsambhārāṇāṃ sambhāratvaṃ sa vai yatra-yatra yajñasya nyaktaṃ tatastataḥ
GV03sb_14_u:116: kṛṣṇājinaṃ sambharati yajño vai kṛṣṇajinaṃ yajña evainametatsambharati
GV03sb_14_u:117: lomataścandāṃsi vai lomāni candaḥsvevainametatsambharatyuttarata udīcī hi
GV03sb_14_u:120: abhryā vajro vā abhrirvīryam vai vajro vīryeṇaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:123: audumbarī bhavati ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjaivainametadrasena samardhayati
GV03sb_14_u:126: atho vaikaṅkatī prajāpatiryām prathamāmāhutimajuhotsa hutvā yatra nyamṛṣṭa tato
GV03sb_14_u:130: aratnimātrī bhavati bāhurvā aratnirbāhuno vai vīryaṃ kriyate vīryasammitaiva
GV03sb_14_u:133: tāmādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo hastābhyāmādade
GV03sb_14_u:136: tāṃ savye pāṇau kṛtvā dakṣiṇenābhimṛśya japati yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo
GV03sb_14_u:137: viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvideka inmahī devasya
GV03sb_14_u:140: atha mṛtpiṇḍam pavrigṛhṇāti abhryā ca dakṣiṇato hastena ca hastenaivottarato devī
GV03sb_14_u:141: dyāvāpṛthivī iti yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣaratsa ime dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_14_u:142: agacadyanmṛdiyaṃ tadyadāpo'sau tanmṛdaścāpāṃ ca mahāvīrāḥ kṛtā bhavanti
GV03sb_14_u:143: tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti tasmādāha devī dyāvāpṛthivī iti
GV03sb_14_u:144: makhasya vāmadya śiro rādhyāsamiti yajño vai makho yajñasya vāmadya śiro
GV03sb_14_u:145: rādhyāsamityevaitadāha devayajane pṛthivyā iti devayajane hi pṛthivyai sambharati
GV03sb_14_u:146: makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa iti yajño vai makho yajñāya tvā yajñasya tvā
GV03sb_14_u:149: atha valmīkavapām devyo vamrya ityetā vā etadakurvata yathā-yathaitadyajñasya
GV03sb_14_u:150: śiro'cidyata tābhirevainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti bhūtasya prathamajā
GV03sb_14_u:151: itīyam vai pṛthivī bhūtasya prathamajā tadanayaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:152: karoti makhasya vo'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya tvā makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:155: atha varāhavihatam iyatyagra āsīditīyatī ha vā iyamagre pṛthivyāsa prādeśamātrī
GV03sb_14_u:156: tāmemūṣa iti varāha ujjaghāna so'syāḥ patiḥ prajāpatistenaivainametanmithunena
GV03sb_14_u:157: priyeṇa dhāmnā samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti makhasya te'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:158: devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:160: athādārān indrasyauja stheti yatra vā enamindra ojasā paryagṛhṇāttadasya
GV03sb_14_u:161: parigṛhītasya raso vyakṣaratsa pūyannivāśeta so'bravīdādīryeva bata ma eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:163: tasmātpūtīkāstasmādagnāvāhutirivābhyāhitā jvalanti tasmādu surabhayo yajñasya hi
GV03sb_14_u:164: rasātsambhūtā atha yadenaṃ tadindra ojasā paryagṛhṇāttasmādāhendrasyauja stheti
GV03sb_14_u:165: makhasya vo'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya tvā makhasya tvā
GV03sb_14_u:169: samabhavattayaivainametacucā samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti makhāya tvā makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:172: tānvā etānpañca sambhārānsambharati pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pañcartavaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:173: samvatsarasya samvatsara eṣa ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti
GV03sb_14_u:174: tāntsambhṛtānabhimṛśati makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:176: athottarataḥ pariśritam bhavati tadabhiprayanto japanti praitu brahmaṇaspatirityeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:177: vai brahmaṇaspatirya eṣa tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha
GV03sb_14_u:178: praitu brahmaṇaspatiriti pradevyetu sūnṛteti devī hyeṣā sūnṛtācā vīraṃ naryam
GV03sb_14_u:182: pariśritam bhavati etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na
GV03sb_14_u:183: hanyuriti tasmā etām puram paryaśrayaṃstathaivāsmā ayametām puram pariṣrayati
GV03sb_14_u:185: atha khare sādayati makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhuratha
GV03sb_14_u:186: mṛtpiṇḍamapādāya mahāvīraṃ karoti makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva
GV03sb_14_u:187: bandhuḥ prādeśamātram prādeśamātramiva hi śiro madhye saṅgṛhītam madhye
GV03sb_14_u:189: nāsikāmevāsminnetaddadhāti taṃ niṣṭhitamabhimṛśati makhasya śiro'sīti makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:190: hyetatsaumyasya śira evamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣṇīṃ rauhiṇakapāle
GV03sb_14_u:192: prajāpatirvā eṣa yajño bhavati ubhayam vā etatprajāpatirniruktaścāniruktaśca
GV03sb_14_u:193: parimitaścāparimitaśca tadyadyajuṣā karoti yadevāsya niruktam parimitaṃ rūpaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:194: tadasya tena saṃskarotyatha yattūṣṇīṃ yadevāsyāniruktamaparimitaṃ rūpaṃ tadasya
GV03sb_14_u:195: tena saṃskaroti sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya evam
GV03sb_14_u:198: atha gavedhukābhirhinvati yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣarattata etā oṣadhayo
GV03sb_14_u:199: jajñire tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti makhāya tvā makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:200: tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhurevamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣṇīṃ rauhiṇakapāle
GV03sb_14_u:202: athaināndhūpayati aśvasya tvā vṛṣṇaḥ śaknā dhūpayāmīti vṛṣā vā aśvo vīryam vai
GV03sb_14_u:203: vṛṣā vīryeṇaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya
GV03sb_14_u:204: tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhurevamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣnīṃ
GV03sb_14_u:207: athaināñcrapayati śṛtaṃ hi devānāmiṣṭkābhiḥ śrapayatyeta vā etadakurvata
GV03sb_14_u:209: tadu yenaiva suśṛtāḥ syustena śrapayedatha pacanamavadhāya mahāvīramavadadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:210: makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhurevamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane
GV03sb_14_u:213: sa udvapati ṛjave tvetyasau vai loka ṛjuḥ satyaṃ hyṛjuḥ satyameṣa ya eṣa tavpatyeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:216: sādhave tveti ayam vai sādhuryo'yam pavata eṣa hīmāṃlokāntsiddho'nupavata eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:217: u dvitīyaḥ pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha sādhave tveti
GV03sb_14_u:219: sukṣityai tveti ayam vai lokaḥ sukṣitirasminhi loke sarvāṇi bhūtāni kṣiyantyatho
GV03sb_14_u:220: agnirvai sukṣitiragnirhyevāsmiṃloke sarvāṇi bhūtāni kṣiyatyeṣa u tṛtīyaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:221: pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha sukṣityai tveti tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣṇīṃ
GV03sb_14_u:224: athainānācṛṇatti ajāyai payasā makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva
GV03sb_14_u:227: athaitadvai āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūte bhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:230: sa yadaitadātithyena pracarati atha pravargyeṇa cariṣyanpuropasado'greṇa
GV03sb_14_u:232: mahāvīram parīṣāsau pinvane rauhiṇakapāle rauhiṇahavanyau srucau yadu
GV03sb_14_u:235: vīryam yadā vai dvau saṃrabhete atha tau vīryaṃ kuruto dvandvam vai mithunam
GV03sb_14_u:239: hotarabhiṣṭuhīti brahmā vai yajñasya dakṣiṇata āste'bhigoptā
GV03sb_14_u:240: tamevaitadāhāpramatta āssva yajñasya śiraḥ pratidhāsyāma iti hotarabhiṣṭuhīti yajño
GV03sb_14_u:241: vai hotā tamevaitadāha yajñasya śiraḥ pratidhehīti pratipadyate hotā
GV03sb_14_u:243: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāditi asau vā ādityo brahmāharahaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:244: purastājjāyata eṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha brahma jajñānam
GV03sb_14_u:247: sa prokṣati yamāya tvetyeṣa vai yamo ya eṣa tapatyeṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:248: yamayatyetenedaṃ sarvaṃ yatameṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha
GV03sb_14_u:251: makhāya tveti eṣa vai makho ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti
GV03sb_14_u:254: sūryasya tvā tapasa iti eṣa vai sūryo ya eṣa tapatyeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:255: pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha sūryasya tvā tapasa iti
GV03sb_14_u:257: pūrvayā dvārā sthūṇāṃ nirhṛtya dakṣiṇato niminvanti yathaināṃ
GV03sb_14_u:258: hotābhiṣṭuvanparāpaśyedyajño vai hotā sa evāsyāmetadyajñam pratidadhāti tathaiṣā
GV03sb_14_u:264: audumbarī bhavati ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjaivainametadrasena samardhayati
GV03sb_14_u:267: aṃsadaghnā bhavati aṃsayorvā idaṃ śiraḥ pratiṣthitam tadaṃsayorevaitaciraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:270: bālvajībhī rajjubhirvyutā bhavati yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣarattata etā
GV03sb_14_u:271: oṣadhayo jajñire tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnam karoti
GV03sb_14_u:273: atha yaduttarata āsādayati yajño vai somaḥ śiraḥ pravargya uttaram vai
GV03sb_14_u:274: śirastasmāduttarata āsādayatyatho rājā vai somaḥ samrāṭ pravargya uttaram vai
GV03sb_14_u:277: sa yatraitāṃ hotānvāha añjanti yam prathayanto na viprā iti tadetam pracaraṇīyam
GV03sb_14_u:278: mahāvīramājyena samanakti devastvā savitā madhvānaktviti savitā vai devānām
GV03sb_14_u:279: prasavitā sarvamvā idam madhu yadidaṃ kiṃ ca tadenamanena sarveṇa samanakti
GV03sb_14_u:280: tadasmai savitā prasavitā prasauti tasmādāha devastvā savitā madhvānaktviti
GV03sb_14_u:282: athottarataḥ sikatā upakīrṇā bhavanti tadrajatam hiraṇyamadhastādupāsyati pṛthivyāḥ
GV03sb_14_u:283: saṃspṛśaspāhītyetadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamadhastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na
GV03sb_14_u:284: hanyurityagnervā etadreto yaddhiraṇyaṃ nāṣṭrāṇāṃ rakṣasāmapahatyā atho pṛthivyu
GV03sb_14_u:285: ha vā etasmādbibhayāṃ cakāra yadvai māyaṃ taptaḥ śuśucāno na hiṃsyāditi tadevāsyā
GV03sb_14_u:286: etadantardadhāti rajatam bhavati rajataiva hīyam pṛthivī
GV03sb_14_u:288: sa yatraitāṃ hotānvāha saṃsīdasva mahām mahām asīti tadubhayata ādīptā
GV03sb_14_u:289: mauñjāḥ pralavā bhavanti tānupāsya teṣu pravṛṇakti yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso
GV03sb_14_u:290: vyakṣarattata etā oṣadhayo jajñire tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:293: atha yadubhayata ādīptā bhavanti sarvābhya evaitaddigbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_14_u:294: apahanti tasminpravṛjyamāne patnī śiraḥ prorṇute tapto vā eṣa śuśucāno bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:297: sa pravṛṇakti arcirasi śocirasi tapo'sītyeṣa vai gharmo ya eṣa tapati sarvam vā
GV03sb_14_u:300: athāsyāmāśiṣa āśāsta iyam vai yajño'syāmevaitadāśiṣa āśāste tā asmā iyaṃ sarvāḥ

GV03sb_14_u:619: dhārayetyevaitadāha brahma dhāraya kṣatraṃ dhāraya viśaṃ dhārayetyetatsarvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:622: atha śākalairjuhoti prāṇā vai śākalāḥ prāṇānevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:624: svāhā pūṣṇe śarasa iti ayam vai pūṣā yo'yam pavata eṣa hīdaṃ sarvam puṣyatyeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:625: u prāṇaḥ prāṇamevāsminnetaddadhāti tasmādāha svāhā pūṣṇe śarasa ityavaraṃ
GV03sb_14_u:626: svāhākāraṃ karoti parāṃ devatāmasāveva bandhurhutvā madhyame paridhāupaśrayati
GV03sb_14_u:628: svāhā grāvabhya iti prāṇā vai grāvāṇaḥ prāṇānevāsminnetaddadhāti hutvā madhyame
GV03sb_14_u:631: svāhā pratiravebhya iti prāṇā vai pratiravāḥ prāṇānhīdaṃ sarvam pratiratam
GV03sb_14_u:634: svāhā pitṛbhya ūrdhvabarhirbhyo gharmapāvabhya iti ahutvaivodaṅṅīkṣamāṇo
GV03sb_14_u:635: dakṣiṇārdhe barhiṣa upagūhati yajñasya śīrṣac>innasya [raso vyakṣaratsa]
GV03sb_14_u:636: pitṝ!nagacattrayā vai pitarastānevaitatprīṇātyatha yanna prekṣate sakṛdu hyeva
GV03sb_14_u:642: svāhā viśvebhyo devebhya iti prāṇā vai viśve devāḥ prāṇānevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:646: svāhā rudrāya rudrahūtaya iti ahutvaiva dakṣiṇekṣamāṇaḥ pratiprasthātre prayacati
GV03sb_14_u:647: taṃ sa uttarataḥ śālāyā udañcaṃ nirasyatyeṣā hyetasya devasya
GV03sb_14_u:648: dikṣvāyāmevainametaddiśi prīṇātyatha yanna prekṣate nenmā rudro hinasaditi
GV03sb_14_u:650: saptaitā āhutayo bhvanti sapta vā ime śīrṣanprāṇāstānevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:652: atha mahāvīrādupayamanyām pratyānayati svāhā saṃ jyotiṣā jyotiriti jyotirvā
GV03sb_14_u:653: itarasminpayo bhavati jyotiritarasyāṃ te hyetadubhe jyotiṣī saṅgacete avaraṃ
GV03sb_14_u:656: atha rauhiṇau juhoti ahaḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ sujyotirjyotiṣā svāhetyasāveva bandhū
GV03sb_14_u:657: rātriḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ sujyotirjyotiṣā svāhetyasāveva bandhuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:659: atha yajamānāya gharmociṣṭam prayacati sa upahavamiṣṭvā bhakṣayati madhu
GV03sb_14_u:661: deva gharma namaste astu mā mā hiṃsīrityāśiṣamevaitadāśāste
GV03sb_14_u:663: atha dakṣiṇataḥ sikatā upakīrṇā bhavanti tanmārjayante ya eva mārjālīye bandhuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:664: so'trānupraharati śākalānathopasadā carantyetadu yajñasya śiraḥ saṃskṛtaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:667: taṃ na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyāt enasyaṃ hi tadatho nenma indraḥ śiraścinadaditi
GV03sb_14_u:668: dvitīye vaiva tṛtīye vāpaśīrṣṇā hyevāgre yajñena devā arcantaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:669: śrāmyantaścerustasmāddvitīye vaiva tṛtīye vātho tapto vā eṣa śuśucāno bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:671: taṃ yatprathamaya]ñe pravṛñjyāt eṣo'sya taptaḥ śuśucānaḥ prajāṃ ca paśūṃśca
GV03sb_14_u:672: pradahedatho āyuḥ pramāyuko yajamānaḥ syāttasmāddvitīye vaiva tṛtīye vā
GV03sb_14_u:674: taṃ na sarvasmā iva pravṛñjyāt sarvam vai pravargyo netsarvasmā iva sarvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:675: karavāṇīti yo nveva jñatastasmai pravṛñjyādyo vāsya priyaḥ syādyo
GV03sb_14_u:678: sahasre pravṛñjyāt sarvam vai sahasraṃ sarvameṣa sarvavedase pravṛñjyātsarvam vai
GV03sb_14_u:679: sarvavedasaṃ sarvameṣa viśvajiti sarvapṛṣthe pravṛñjyātsarvam vai
GV03sb_14_u:680: viśvajitsarvapṛṣṭhaḥ sarvameṣa vājapeye rājasūye pravṛñjyātsarvaṃ hi tatsattre
GV03sb_14_u:681: pravṛñjyātsarvam vai sattraṃ sarvameṣa etānyasya pravarjanānyato nānyatra
GV03sb_14_u:685: puroḍāśena ceti brūyātkathaṃ cāturmāsyānīti payasyayeti brūyātkatham paśubandha
GV03sb_14_u:686: iti paśunā ca puroḍāśena ceti brūyātkathaṃ saumyo'dhvara iti havirdhāneneti brūyāt
GV03sb_14_u:688: atho āhuḥ yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya śira etaddevāḥ pratyadadhuryadātithyaṃ na ha vā
GV03sb_14_u:689: asyāpaśīrṣṇā kena cana yajñeneṣṭam bhavati ya evametadveda
GV03sb_14_u:691: tadāhuḥ yatpraṇītāḥ praṇayanti yajñe'tha kasmādatra na praṇayatīti śiro vā
GV03sb_14_u:692: etadyajñāsya yatpraṇītāḥ śiraḥ pravargyo necirasā śiro'bhyārohayāṇīti
GV03sb_14_u:694: tadāhuḥ yatprayājānuyājā anyatra bhavantyatha kasmādatra na bhavantīti prāṇā vai
GV03sb_14_u:695: prayājānuyājāḥ prāṇā avakāśāḥ prāṇāḥ śākala netprāṇaiḥ prāṇānabhyārohayāṇīti
GV03sb_14_u:697: tadāhuḥ yadājyabhāgāvanyatra juhvatyatha kasmādatra na juhotīti cakṣuṣī vā ete
GV03sb_14_u:698: yajñasya yadājyabhāgau cakṣuṣī rauhiṇau neccakṣuṣā cakṣurabhyārohayāṇīti
GV03sb_14_u:700: tadāhuḥ yadvānaspatyairdevebhyo juhvatyatha kasmādetam mṃmayenaiva juhotīti
GV03sb_14_u:701: yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣaratsa ime dyāvāpṛthivī agacadyanmṛdiyaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:702: tadyadāpo'sau tanmṛdaścāpāṃ ca mahāvīrāḥ kṛtā bhavanti tenaivainametadrasena
GV03sb_14_u:705: sa yadvānaspatyaḥ syāt pradahyeta yaddhiraṇmayaḥ syātpralīyeta yallohamayaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:709: athaitadvai āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūte bhakṣ|ayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:712: sa vai tṛtīye'han ṣaṣṭhe vā dvādaśe vā pravargyopasadau samasya
GV03sb_14_u:720: atha yanmukhadaghne uparīva vai tadyanmukhadaghnamuparīva tadyadasau
GV03sb_14_u:721: lokastadyāmuṃ lokaṃ śugāviśattayaivainametacucā samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti
GV03sb_14_u:723: yā te gharma divyā śugiti yaiva divyā śugyā gāyatryāṃhavirdhāna iti yaiva gāyatryāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:724: havirdhāne sā ta āpyāyatāṃ niṣṭyāyatāṃ tasyai te svāheti nātra tirohitamivāsti
GV03sb_14_u:726: atha dvitīyamujjvalayya nābhidaghne dhārayamāṇo juhoti madhyamiva vai
GV03sb_14_u:730: yāte gharmāntarikṣe śugiti yaivāntarikṣe śugyā triṣṭubhyāgnīdhra iti yaiva
GV03sb_14_u:731: triṣṭubhyāgnīdhre sā ta āpyāyatāṃ niṣṭyāyatāṃ tasyai te svāheti nātra tirohitamivāsti
GV03sb_14_u:733: atha tṛtīyamabhyādhāya tasminnāsīno juhotyadha-iva vai tadyadāsīno'dha-iva
GV03sb_14_u:734: tadyadayaṃ lokastadyemaṃ lokaṃ śugāviśattayaivainametacucā samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:737: yā te gharma pṛthivyāṃ śugiti yaiva pṛthivyāṃ śugyā jagatyāṃ sadasyeti yaiva
GV03sb_14_u:738: jagatyāṃ sadasyā sā taāpyāyatāṃ niṣṭyāyatāṃ tasyai te svāheti nātra tirohitamivāsti
GV03sb_14_u:740: athopaniṣkrāmati kṣatrasya tvā paraspāyetyetadvai daivaṃ kṣatraṃ ya eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:741: tapatyasya tvā mānuṣasya kṣatrasya paraspatvāyetyevaitadāha brahmaṇastanvam
GV03sb_14_u:742: pāhīti brahmaṇa ātmānaṃ gopāyetyevaitadāha viśastvā dharmaṇā vayamiti yajño vai
GV03sb_14_u:743: viḍyajñasya tvāriṣṭyā ityevaitadāmānukrāmāma suvitāya navyasa iti yajñasya
GV03sb_14_u:746: athāha sāma gāyeti sāma brūhīti vā gāyeti tveva brūyādgāyanti hi sāma tadyatsāma
GV03sb_14_u:747: gāyati nedimānbahirdhā yajñācarīrānnāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hinasanniti sāma hi nāṣṭrāṇāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:750: āgneyyāṃ gāyati agnirhi rakṣasāmapahantāticandasi gāyatyeṣā vai sarvāṇi candāṃsi
GV03sb_14_u:753: sa gāyati agniṣṭapati pratidahatyahāvo'hāva iti tannāṣṭrā vai
GV03sb_14_u:756: ta udañco niṣkrāmanti jag>anena cātvālamagreṇāgnīdhrameṣā hi yajñasya dvāḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:759: tam vai pariṣyanda utsādayet tapto vā eṣa śuśucāno bhavati taṃ
GV03sb_14_u:761: yatpariṣyanda utsādayati tatho ha naivāpo hinasti nemāṃ yadahāpsu na prāsyati
GV03sb_14_u:762: tenāpo na hinastyatha yatsamantamāpaḥ pariyanti śāntirvā āpasteno imāṃ na hinasti
GV03sb_14_u:765: uttaravedau tvevotsādayet yajño vā uttaravediḥ śiraḥ pravargyo yajña evataciraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:768: uttaranābhyā saṃspṛṣṭam prathamam pravargyamutsādayati vāgvā uttaranābhiḥ
GV03sb_14_u:771: catuḥsraktiriti eṣa vai catuḥsraktirya eṣa tapati diśo hyetasya sraktayastasmādāha
GV03sb_14_u:774: nābhirṛtasya saprathā iti satyam vā ṛtaṃ satyasya nābhiḥ saprathā ityevaitadāha sa no
GV03sb_14_u:775: viśvāyuḥ saprathā iti sa naḥ sarvāyuḥ saprathā ityevaitadāha
GV03sb_14_u:777: apa dveṣo apa hvara iti nātra tirohitamivāstyanyavratasya saścimetyanyadvā etasya
GV03sb_14_u:781: purastādupaśayām mṛdam māṃsamevāsminnetaddadhāti tadabhitaḥ parīśāsau bāhū
GV03sb_14_u:785: uttarato'bhrim taddhi tasyā āyatanaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ samrāḍāsandīṃ taddhi tasyā
GV03sb_14_u:786: āyatanamuttarataḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ taddhi tasyāyatanaṃ sarvato dhavitrāṇi prāṇā vai
GV03sb_14_u:787: dhavitrāṇi prāṇānevāsminnetaddad>āti trīṇi bhavanti trayo vai prāṇāḥ pr:ṇa udāno
GV03sb_14_u:794: yadekakapāle bhavata ekakapāle iva hīme jānunī paścāddhṛṣṭī
GV03sb_14_u:795: pādāvevāsminnetaddadhāti pādābhyāṃ hi dhṛṣṭam praharatyuttarataḥ kharau
GV03sb_14_u:796: pracaraṇīyau taddhi tayorāyatanaṃ dakṣiṇato mārjālīyaṃ taddhi tasyāyatanam
GV03sb_14_u:799: purīṣamannamevāsminnetaddadhāti tena vardhasva cā ca pyāyasveti nātra
GV03sb_14_u:800: tirohitamivāsti vardhiṣīmahi ca vayamā ca pyāsiṣīmahītyāśiṣamevaitadāśāste
GV03sb_14_u:802: sa vai na sarvamivānayet nedyajamānātparāgannamasadityardham vā bhūyo vā
GV03sb_14_u:803: pariṣinaṣṭi tasminnaparāhṇe yajamānāya vratamabhyutsicya prayacati tadyajamāna
GV03sb_14_u:804: evaitadannādyaṃ dadhāti tatho ha yajamānānna parāgannam bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:806: athainamadbhiḥ pariṣiñcati śāntirvā āpaḥ śamayatyevainametatsarvataḥ pariṣiñcati
GV03sb_14_u:807: sarvata evainametacamayati triṣkṛtvaḥ pariṣiñcati trivṛddhi yajñaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:809: athāha vārṣāharaṃ sāma gāyati eṣa vai vṛṣā harirya eṣa tapatyeṣa u
GV03sb_14_u:812: atha cātvāle mārjayante sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santvityañjalināpa upācati vajro
GV03sb_14_u:813: vā āpo vajreṇaivaitanmitradheyaṃ kurute durmitriyāstasmai santu yo'smāndveṣṭi yaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:814: ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti yāmasya diśaṃ dveṣyaḥ syāttāṃ diśaṃ parāsiñcettenaiva tam
GV03sb_14_u:817: atha prāṅivodaṅṅutkrāmati udvayaṃ tamasasparīti pāpmā vai tamaḥ pāpmānameva
GV03sb_14_u:818: tamo'pahate svaḥ paśyanta uttaramityayam vai loko'dbhya uttaro'sminneva loke
GV03sb_14_u:819: pratitiṣṭhati devaṃ devatrā sūryamaganma jyotiruttamamiti svargo vai lokaḥ sūryo
GV03sb_14_u:821: samidhamabhyādadhāti samidasi tejo'si tejo mayi dhehītyāśiṣamevaitadāśāste
GV03sb_14_u:823: atha prasute dadhigharmeṇa caranti yajño vai somaḥ śiraḥ pravargyo yajña
GV03sb_14_u:824: evaitaciraḥ pratidadhāti mādhyandine savana etadvā indrasya niṣkevalyaṃ savanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:825: yanmādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ sva evainametadbhāge prīṇāti stute mādhyandine
GV03sb_14_u:830: sa ānīyamāna āha hotarvadasva yatte vādyamiti vadate hyatra
GV03sb_14_u:831: hotāthopottiṣṭhannāha śrātaṃ haviriti śrātaṃ hi bhavatyatikramyāśrāvyāha
GV03sb_14_u:832: dadhigharmasya yajeti vaṣaṭkṛte juhotyanuvaṣaṭkṛta āharati bhakṣaṃ taṃ
GV03sb_14_u:835: sa upahavamiṣṭvā bhakṣayati mayi tyadindriyam bṛhadityetadvā indriyam bṛhadya
GV03sb_14_u:836: eṣa tapati mayi dakṣo mayi kraturiti kratūdakṣāvevātmandhatte
GV03sb_14_u:837: gharmastriśugvirājatīti gharmo hyeṣa triśugvirājati virājā jyotiṣā saheti virājā hyeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:838: jyotiṣā saha brahmaṇā tejasā saheti brahmaṇā hyeṣa tejasā saha payaso reta
GV03sb_14_u:839: ābhṛtamiti payaso hyetadreta ābhṛtaṃ tasya dohamaśīmahyuttarāmuttarāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:842: athāto dakṣiṇānām suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ śatamānam brahmaṇe dadātyāsīno vai brahmā
GV03sb_14_u:843: yaśaḥ śayānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ tasmātsuvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ śatamānam brahmaṇe dadāti
GV03sb_14_u:845: atha yaiṣā gharmadughā tāmadhvaryave dadāti tapta-iva vai
GV03sb_14_u:848: atha yaiṣā yajamānasya vratadughā tāṃ hotre dadāti yajño vai hotā yajño
GV03sb_14_u:851: atha yaiṣā patnyai vratadughā tāmudgātṛbhyo dadāti patnīkarmeva vā ete'tra
GV03sb_14_u:854: athaitadvai āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūte bhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:857: sarveṣām vā eṣa bhūtānām sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā yadyajñastasya samṛddhimanu
GV03sb_14_u:858: yajamānaḥ prajayā paśubhirṛdhyate vi vā eṣa prajayā paśubhirṛdhyate yasya gharmo
GV03sb_14_u:861: pūrṇāhutiṃ juhoti sarvam vai pūrṇaṃ sarveṇaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca vivṛḍhaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:864: svāhā prāṇebhyaḥ sādhipatikebhya iti mano vai prāṇānāmadhipatirmanasi hi sarve
GV03sb_14_u:865: prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca vivṛḍhaṃ yajñasya
GV03sb_14_u:867: pṛthivyai svāheti pṛthivī vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:873: antarikṣāya svāheti antarikṣam vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:875: vāyave svāheti vāyurvai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:877: dive svāheti dyaurvai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:879: sūryāya svāheti sūryo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:881: digbhyaḥ svāheti diśo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:883: candrāya svāheti candro vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:885: nakṣatrebhyaḥ svāheti nakṣatrāṇi vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:887: adbhyaḥ svāheti āpo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:889: varuṇāya svāheti varuṇo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā tatsarvā>
GV03sb_14_u:891: nābhyai svāhā pūtāya svāheti aniruktamanirukto vai prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_14_u:894: trayodaśaitā āhutayo bhavanti trayodaśa vai māsāḥ samvatsarasya samvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:897: vāce svāheti mukhamevāsminnetaddadhāti prāṇāya svāhā prāṇāya svāheti nāsike
GV03sb_14_u:898: evāsminnetaddadhāti cakṣuṣe svāhā cakṣuṣe svāhetyakṣiṇī evāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:901: saptaitā āhutayo bhavanti sapta vā ime śīrṣanprāṇāstānevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:902: pūrṇāhutimuttamāṃ juhoti sarvam vai pūrṇaṃ sarveṇaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_14_u:905: manasaḥ kāmamākūtimiti manasā vā idaṃ sarvamāptaṃ tanmanasaivaitadbhiṣajyati
GV03sb_14_u:908: vācaḥ satyamaśīyeti vācā vā idaṃ sarvamāptaṃ tadvācaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_14_u:909: vivṛḍhaṃ yajñasya paśūnāṃ rūpamannasya raso yaśaḥ śrīḥ śrayatām mayi
GV03sb_14_u:912: atha taṃ copaśayāṃ ca piṣṭvā mārtsnayā mṛdā saṃsṛjyāvṛtā karotyāvṛtā
GV03sb_14_u:915: saṃvatsaro vai pravargyaḥ sarvam vai saṃvatsaraḥ sarvam pravargyaḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:916: yatpravṛktastadvasanto yadrucitastadgrīṣmo yatpinvitastadvarṣā yadā vai varṣāh
GV03sb_14_u:917: pinvante'thaināḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvante ha vāasmai varṣā ya
GV03sb_14_u:920: ime vai lokāḥ pravargyaḥ sarvam vā ime lokāḥ sarvam pravargyaḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:921: yatpravṛktastadayaṃ loko yadrucitastadantarikṣaloko yatpinvitastadasau loko yadā vā
GV03sb_14_u:922: asau lokaḥ pinvate'thainaṃ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvate ha vā asm:
GV03sb_14_u:925: etā vai devatāḥ pravargyaḥ agnirvāyurādityaḥ sarvam vā etā devatā sarvam
GV03sb_14_u:927: asāvādityaḥpinvate'thainaṃ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvate ha vā asmā
GV03sb_14_u:930: yajamāno vai pravargyaḥ tasyātmā prajā paśavaḥ sarvam vai yajamānaḥ sarvam
GV03sb_14_u:931: pravargyaḥ sa yatpravṛktastadātmā yadrucitastatprajā yatpinvitastatpaśavo yadā vai
GV03sb_14_u:932: paśavaḥ pinvate'thaināntsarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvante ha vā asmai
GV03sb_14_u:935: agnihotram vai pravargyaḥ sarvam vāagnihotraṃ sarvam pravargyaḥ sa yadadhiśritaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:936: tatpravṛkto yadunnītaṃ tadrucito yaddhutaṃ tatpinvito yadā vāagnihotram
GV03sb_14_u:937: pinvate'thainatsarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvate ha vā asmā agnihotraṃ
GV03sb_14_u:940: darśapūrṇamāsau vai pravargyaḥ sarvam vai darśapūrṇamāsau sarvam pravargyaḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:941: yadadhiśritaṃ tatpravṛkto yadāsannaṃ tadrucito yaddhutaṃ tatpinvito yadā vai
GV03sb_14_u:942: darśapūrṇamāsau pinvete athainau sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvete ha
GV03sb_14_u:945: cāturmāsyāni vai pravargyaḥ sarvam vai cāturmāsyāni sarvam pravargyaḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:951: cito yaddhutaṃ tatpinvito yadā vai cāturmāsyāni pinvante'thaināni sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_14_u:952: bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvante ha vā asmai cāturmāsyāni ya evametadveda
GV03sb_14_u:954: paśubandho vai pravargyaḥ sarvam vai paśubandhaḥ sarvam pravargyaḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:956: paśubandhaḥ pinvate'thainaṃ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupajīvanti pinvate ha vā
GV03sb_14_u:959: somo vai pravargyaḥ sarvam vai somaḥ sarvam pravargyaḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:960: yadabhiṣutastatpravṛkto yadunnītastadrucito yaddhutastatpinvito yadā vai somaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:961: pinvate'thainaṃ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyupayuñjanti pinvate ha vā asmai somo ya
GV03sb_14_u:962: evametadveda na ha vā asyāpravargyeṇa kena cana yajñeneṣṭam bhavati ya
GV03sb_14_u:965: athaitadvai āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūte bhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:968: dvayā ha prājāpatyāḥ devāścāsurāśca tataḥ kānīyasā eva devā jyāyasā asurāstaeṣu
GV03sb_14_u:971: te ha devā ūcuḥ hantāsurānyajña udgīthenātyayāmeti
GV03sb_14_u:973: te ha vācamūcuḥ tvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhyo vāgudagāyadyo vāci bhogastaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:974: devebhya āgāyadyatkalyāṇam vadati tadātmane te'viduranena vai na
GV03sb_14_u:975: udgātrātyeṣyantīti tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyantsa yaḥ sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:976: yadevedamapratirūpam vadati sa eva sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:978: atha ha prāṇamūcuḥ tvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhyaḥ prāṇa udagāyadyaḥ prāṇe
GV03sb_14_u:979: bhogastaṃ devebhya āgāyadyatkalyāṇaṃ jighrati tadātmane te'viduranena vai na
GV03sb_14_u:980: udgātrātyeṣyantīti tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyantsa yaḥ sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:981: yadevedamapratirūpaṃ jighrati sa eva sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:983: atha ha cakṣurūcuḥ tvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhyaścakṣurudagāyadyaścakṣuṣi
GV03sb_14_u:984: bhogastaṃ devebhya āgāyadyatkalyāṇam paśyati tadātmane te'viduranena vai na
GV03sb_14_u:985: udgātrātyeṣyantīti tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyantsa yaḥ sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:986: yadevedamapratirūpam paśyati sa eva sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:988: atha ha śrotramūcuḥ tvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhyaḥ śrotramudagāyadyaḥ śrotre
GV03sb_14_u:989: bhogastaṃ devebhya āgāyadyatkalyāṇaṃ śṛṇoti tadātmane te'viduranena vai na
GV03sb_14_u:990: udgātrātyeṣyantīti tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyantsa yaḥ sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:991: yadevedamapratirūpaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:993: atha ha mana ūcuḥ tvam na udgāyeti tatheti tebhyo mana udagāyadyo manasi
GV03sb_14_u:994: bhogastaṃ devebhya āgāyadyatkalyāṇaṃ saṅkalpayati tadātmane te'viduranena vai na
GV03sb_14_u:995: udgātrātyeṣyantīti tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvidhyantsa yaḥ sa pāpmā
GV03sb_14_u:996: yadevedamapratirūpaṃ saṅkalpayati sa eva sa pāpmaivamu khalvetā devatāḥ
GV03sb_14_u:999: atha hemamāsanyam prāṇamūcuḥ tvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa
GV03sb_14_u:1000: udagāyatte'viduranena vai na udgātrātyeṣyantīti tamabhidrutya pāpmanāvivyatsantsa
GV03sb_14_u:1001: yathāśmānamṛtvā loṣṭo vidhvaṃsetaivaṃ haiva vidhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco vineśustato
GV03sb_14_u:1002: devā abhavanparāsurā bhavatyātmanā parāsya dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evam veda
GV03sb_14_u:1004: te hocuḥ kva nu so'bhūdyo na itthamasaktetyayamāsye'ntariti so'yāsya
GV03sb_14_u:1007: sā vā eṣā devatā dūḥ nāma dūraṃ hyasyā mṛtyurdūraṃ ha vā asmānmṛtyurbhavati ya
GV03sb_14_u:1010: sā vā eṣā devatā etāsāṃ devatānām pāpmānam mṛtyumapahatya yatrāsāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1014: sā vā eṣā devatā etāsāṃ devatānām pāpmānam mṛtyumapahatyāthainā
GV03sb_14_u:1017: sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahat sā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata
GV03sb_14_u:1020: atha prāṇamatyavahat sa yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata sa vāyurabhavatso'yam vāyuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1023: atha cakṣuratyavahat tadyadā mṛtyumatyamucyata sa ādityo'bhavatso'sāvādityaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1026: atha śrotramatyavahat tadyadā mṛtyumatyamucyata tā diśo'bhavaṃstā imā diśaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1029: atha mano'tyavahat tadyadā mṛtyumatyamucyata sa candramā abhavatso'sau candraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1030: pareṇa mṛtyumatikrānto bhātyevaṃ ha vā enameṣā devatā mṛtyumativahati ya evam
GV03sb_14_u:1033: athātmane'nnādyamāgāyat yaddhi kiṃ cānnamadyate'nenaiva tadadyata iha
GV03sb_14_u:1036: te devā abruvan etāvadvā idaṃ sarvaṃ yadannaṃ tadātmana āgāsīranu no'sminnanna
GV03sb_14_u:1037: ābhajasveti te vai mābhisamviśateti tatheti taṃ samantam pariṇyaviśanta
GV03sb_14_u:1038: tasmādyadanenānnamatti tenaitāstṛpyantyevaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisamviśanti bhartā
GV03sb_14_u:1039: svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavatyannādo'dhipatirya evam veda
GV03sb_14_u:1041: ya u haivamvidam sveṣu pratipratirbubhūṣati na haivālam bhāryebhyo bhavatyatha
GV03sb_14_u:1042: ya evaitamanu bhavati yo vaitamanu bhāryānbubhūrṣati sa haivālam bhāryebhyo
GV03sb_14_u:1045: so'yāsya āṅiraso aṅgānāṃ hi rasaḥ prāṇo vā aṅgānāṃ rasaḥ prāṇo hi vā aṅgānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1046: rasastasmādyasmātkasmāccāṅgātprāṇa utkrāmati tadeva tacuṣyatyeṣa hi vā aṅgānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1049: eṣa u eva bṛhaspatiḥ vāgvai bṛhatī tasyā eṣa patistasmādu bṛhaspatiḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1051: eṣa u eva brahmaṇaspatiḥ vāgvai brahma tasyā eṣa patistasmādu ha brahmaṇaspatiḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1053: eṣa u eva sāma vāgvai sāmaiṣa sā cāmaśceti tatsāmnaḥ sāmatvaṃ yadveva samaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1054: pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo'nena sarveṇa
GV03sb_14_u:1055: tasmādveva sāmāśnute sāmnaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ ya evametatsāma veda
GV03sb_14_u:1057: eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ prāṇo vā utprāṇena hīdaṃ sarvamuttabdham vāgeva gīthocca
GV03sb_14_u:1060: taddhāpi brahmadattaścaikitāneyo rājānam bhakṣayannuvācāyaṃ tyasya rājā
GV03sb_14_u:1061: mūrdhānam vipātayatādyadito'yāsya āṅgiraso'nyenodagāyaditi vācā ca hyeva sa
GV03sb_14_u:1064: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ svam veda bhavati hāsya svaṃ tasya vai svara eva svaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1065: tasmādārtvijyaṃ kariṣyanvāci svaramiceta tayā vācā svarasampannayārtvijyaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1066: kuryāttasmādyajñe svaravantaṃ didṛkṣanta evātho yasya svam bhavati bhavati hāsya
GV03sb_14_u:1069: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ suvarṇam veda bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ tasya vai svara eva
GV03sb_14_u:1070: suvarṇam bhavati hāsya suvarṇaṃ ya evametatsāmnaḥ suvarṇam veda
GV03sb_14_u:1072: tasya haitasya sāmno yaḥ pratiṣṭhām veda prati ha tiṣṭhati tasya vai vāgeva
GV03sb_14_u:1073: pratiṣṭhā vāci hi khalveṣa etatprāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhito gīyate'nna ityu haika āhuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1075: athātaḥ pavamānānāmevābhyārohaḥ sa vai khalu prastotā sāma prastauti sa yatra
GV03sb_14_u:1076: prastyuāttadetāni japedasato mā sadgamaya tamaso mā jyotirgamaya mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1079: sa yadāhāsato mā sadgamayeti mṛtyurvā asatsadamṛtam mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1082: tamaso mā jyotirgamayeti mṛtyurvai tamo jyotiramṛtam mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1083: gamayāmṛtam mā kurvityevaitadāha mṛtyormāmṛtaṃ gamayeti nātra tirohitamivāsti
GV03sb_14_u:1085: atha yānītarāṇi stotrāṇi teṣvātmane'nnādyamāgāyettasmādu teṣu varam vṛṇīta yam
GV03sb_14_u:1086: kāmaṃ kāmayeta taṃ sa eṣa evamvidudgātātmane vā yajamānāya vā yaṃ kāmaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1087: kāmayate tamāgāyati taddhaitallokajideva na haivālokyatāyā āśāsti ya evametatsāma
GV03sb_14_u:1094: sa yatpūrvo'smāt sarvasmātsarvānpāpmana auṣattasmātpuruṣa oṣati ha vai sa taṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1097: so'bibhet tasmādekākī bibheti sa hāyamīkṣāṃ cakre yanmadanyannāsti kasmānnu
GV03sb_14_u:1098: bibhemīti tata evāsya bhayam vīyāya kasmāddhyabheṣyaddvitīyadvai bhayam
GV03sb_14_u:1101: sa vai naiva reme tasmādekākī na ramate sa dvitīyamaicatsa haitāvānāsa yathā
GV03sb_14_u:1104: sa imamevātmānaṃ dvedhāpātayat tataḥ patiśca patnī cābhavatāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1105: tasmādidamardhavṛgalamiva sva iti ha smāha yājñavalkyastasmādayamākāśa striyā
GV03sb_14_u:1106: pūryata eva tāṃ samabhavattato manuṣyā ajāyanta
GV03sb_14_u:1108: so heyamīkṣāṃ cakre katham nu mātmana eva janayitvā sambhavati hanta
GV03sb_14_u:1111: sā gaurabhavat vṛṣabha itarastāṃ samevābhavattato gāvo'jāyanta
GV03sb_14_u:1113: vaḍavetarābhavat aśvavṛṣa itaro gardabhītarā gardabha itarastāṃ samevābhavattata
GV03sb_14_u:1120: so'vet aham vāva sṛṣṭirasmyahaṃ hīdaṃ sarvamasṛkṣīti tataḥ sṛṣṭirabhavatsṛṣṭyāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1126: tadyadidamāhuḥ amuṃ yajāmuṃ yajetyekaikaṃ devametasyaiva sā visṛṣṭireṣa u
GV03sb_14_u:1129: atha yatkiṃ cedamārdram tadretaso'sṛjata tadu soma etāvadvā idaṃ sarvamannaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1132: saiṣā brahmaṇo'tisṛṣṭiḥ yacreyaso devānasṛjatātha yanmartyaḥ sannamṛtānasṛjata
GV03sb_14_u:1133: tasmādatisṛṣṭiratisṛṣṭyāṃ hāsyaitasyām bhavati ya evam veda
GV03sb_14_u:1139: sa eṣa iha praviṣṭaḥ ā nakhāgrebhyo yathā kṣuraḥ kṣuradhāne'vahitaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1140: syādviśvambharo vā viśvambharakulāye taṃ na paśyantyakṛtsno hi saḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1142: prāṇanneva prāṇo nāma bhavati vadanvākpaśyaṃścakṣuḥ śṛṇvañcrotram manvāno
GV03sb_14_u:1143: manastānyasyaitāni karmanāmānyeva sa yo'ta ekaikamupāste na sa vedākṛtsno
GV03sb_14_u:1146: ātmetyevopāsīta atra hyete sarva ekam bhavanti tadetatpadanīyamasya sarvasya
GV03sb_14_u:1147: yadayamātmānena hyetatsarvam veda yathā ha vai padenānuvindedevaṃ kīrtiṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1150: tadetatpreyaḥ putrāt preyo vittātpreyo'nyasmātsarvasmādantarataraṃ yadayamātmā sa
GV03sb_14_u:1151: yo'nyamātmanaḥ priyam bruvāṇam brūyātpriyaṃ rotsyatītīśvaro ha tathaiva
GV03sb_14_u:1152: syādātmānameva priyamupāsīta sa ya ātmānameva priyamupāste na hāsya priyam
GV03sb_14_u:1155: tadāhuḥ yadbrahmavidyayā sarvam bhaviṣyanto manuṣyā manyante kimu
GV03sb_14_u:1158: brahma vā idamagra āsīt tadātmānamevāvedaham brahmāsmīti
GV03sb_14_u:1163: tadidamapyetarhi ya evam vedāham brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvam bhavati tasya ha na
GV03sb_14_u:1164: devāścanābhūtyā īśata ātmā hyeṣāṃ sa bhavatyatha yo'nyāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1165: devatāmupāste'nyo'sāvanyo'hamasmīti na sa veda yathā paśurevaṃ sa devānāṃ yathā
GV03sb_14_u:1166: ha vai bahavaḥ paśavo manuṣyam bhuñjyurevamekaikaḥ puruṣo
GV03sb_14_u:1170: brahma vā idamagra āsīt ekameva tadekaṃ sanna vyabhavattacreyo rūpamatyasṛjata
GV03sb_14_u:1171: kṣatraṃ yānyetāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo
GV03sb_14_u:1172: mṛtyurīśāna iti tasmātkṣatrātparaṃ nāsti tasmādbrāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyamadhastādupāste
GV03sb_14_u:1173: rājasūye kṣatra eva tadyaśo dadhāti saiṣā kṣatrasya yoniryadbrahma tasmādyadyapi
GV03sb_14_u:1174: rājā paramatāṃ gacati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yoniṃ ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1175: sa yonimṛcati sa pāpīyānbhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā
GV03sb_14_u:1177: sa naiva vyabhavat sa viśamasṛjata yānyetāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo
GV03sb_14_u:1178: rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti
GV03sb_14_u:1180: sa naiva vyabhavat sa śaudram varṇamasṛjata pūṣaṇamiyam vai pūṣeyaṃ hīdaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1183: sa naiva vyabhavat tacreyo rūpamatyasṛjata dharmaṃ tadetatkṣatrasya kṣatraṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1185: yathā rājñaivaṃ yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyam vai tattasmātsatyam
GV03sb_14_u:1186: vadantamāhurdharmam vadatīti dharmam vā vadantaṃ satyam
GV03sb_14_u:1189: tadetadbrahma kṣatram viṭ śūdraḥ tadagninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavadbrāhmaṇo
GV03sb_14_u:1190: manuṣyeṣu kṣatriyeṇa kṣatriyo vaiśyena vaiśyaḥ śūdreṇa śūdrastasmādagnāveva
GV03sb_14_u:1191: deveṣu lokamicante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣvetābhyāṃ hi rūpābhyām brahmābhavat
GV03sb_14_u:1193: atha yo ha vā asmāllokātsvaṃ lokamadṛṣṭvā praiti sa enamavidito na bhunakti yathā
GV03sb_14_u:1194: vedo vānanūkto'nyadvā karmākṛtam yadi ha vā apyanevamvinmahatpuṇyaṃ karma
GV03sb_14_u:1195: karoti taddhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata evātmānameva lokamupāsīta sa ya ātmānameva
GV03sb_14_u:1196: lokamupāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate'smāddhyevātmano yadyatkāmayate tattatsṛjate
GV03sb_14_u:1198: atho ayam vā ātmā sarveṣām bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ sa yajjuhoti yadyajate tena devānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1199: loko'tha yadanubrūte tenarṣīṇāmatha yatprajāmicate yatpitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti tena
GV03sb_14_u:1200: pitṝṇāmatha yanmanuṣyānvāsayate yadebhyo'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇāmatha
GV03sb_14_u:1201: yatpaśubhyastṛṇodakam vindati tena paśūnāṃ yadasya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsyā
GV03sb_14_u:1202: pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ loko yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭimicedevaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1203: haivamvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyariṣṭimicanti tadvā etadviditam mīmāṃsitam
GV03sb_14_u:1205: ātmaivedamagra āsīt eka eva so'kāmayata jāyā me syādatha prajāyeyātha vittam me
GV03sb_14_u:1206: syādatha karma kurvīyetyetānvāvai kāmo necaṃścanāto bhūyo
GV03sb_14_u:1207: vindettasmādapyetarhyekākī kāmayate jāyā me syādatha prajāyeyātha vittam me
GV03sb_14_u:1208: syādatha karma kurvīyeti sa yāvadapyeteṣāmekaikaṃ na prāpnotyakṛtsna eva
GV03sb_14_u:1211: mana evāsyātmā vāgjāyā prāṇaḥ prajā cakṣurmānuṣam vittam cakṣuṣā hi
GV03sb_14_u:1212: tadvindati śrotraṃ daivaṃ śrotreṇa hi tacṛṇotyātmaivāsya karmātmanā hi karma karoti
GV03sb_14_u:1213: sa eṣa pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ pāṅktamidaṃ kiṃ ca tadidaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1214: sarvamāpnoti yadidaṃ kiṃ ca ya evam veda
GV03sb_14_u:1216: yatsaptānnāni medhayā tapasājanayatpitā ekamasya sādhāraṇam dve devānabhājayat
GV03sb_14_u:1217: trīṇyātmane'kuruta paśubhya ekam prāyacat tasmintsarvam pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca
GV03sb_14_u:1218: prāṇiti yacca na kasmāttāni na kṣīyante'dyamānāni sarvadā yo vai tāmakṣitim veda
GV03sb_14_u:1219: so'nnamatti pratīkena sa devānapigacati sa ūrjamupajīvatīti ślokāḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1221: yatsaptānnāni medhayā tapasājanayatpiteti medhayā hi tapasājanayatpitaikamasya
GV03sb_14_u:1222: sādhāraṇamitīdamevāsya tatsādhāraṇamannaṃ yadidamadyate sa ya etadupāste na sa
GV03sb_14_u:1225: dve devānabhājayaditi hutaṃ ca prahutaṃ ca tasmāddevebhyo juhvati ca pra ca
GV03sb_14_u:1228: paśubhya ekam prāyacaditi tatpayaḥ payo hyevāgre manuṣyāśca paśavaścopajīvanti
GV03sb_14_u:1229: tasmātkumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtam vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanam vānudhāpyanti
GV03sb_14_u:1231: atha vatsaṃ jātamāhuḥ atṛṇāda iti tasmintsarvam pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti
GV03sb_14_u:1232: payasi hīdaṃ sarvam pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na
GV03sb_14_u:1234: tadyadidamāhuḥ samvatsaram payasā juhvadapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti na tathā
GV03sb_14_u:1235: vidyādyadahareva juhoti tadahaḥ punarmṛtyumāpajayatyevam vidvāntsarvaṃ hi
GV03sb_14_u:1236: devebhyo'nnādyam prayacati kasmāttāni na kṣīyante'dyamānāni sarvadeti
GV03sb_14_u:1238: puruṣo vā akṣitiḥ sa hīdamannam punaḥ-punarjanayate yo vai tāmakṣitim vedeti
GV03sb_14_u:1239: puruṣo vā akṣitiḥ sa hīdamannaṃ dhiyā-dhiyā janayate karmabhiryaddhaitanna
GV03sb_14_u:1240: kuryātkṣīyeta ha so'nnamatti pratīkeneti mukham pratīkam mukhenetyetatsa
GV03sb_14_u:1243: trīṇyātmane'kuruteti mano vācam prāṇaṃ tānyātmane'kurutānyatramanā abhūvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1244: nādarśamanyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣamiti manasā hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti
GV03sb_14_u:1247: mana eva tasmādapi pṛṣṭhata upaspṛṣṭo manasā vijānāti
GV03sb_14_u:1249: yaḥ kaśca śabdo vāgeva saiṣā hyantamāyattaiṣā hi na prāṇo'pāno vyāna udānaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1250: samāno'na ityetatsarvam prāṇa evaitanmanyo vā ayamātmā vāṅmayo manomayaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1253: trayo lokā eta eva vāgevāyaṃ loko mano'ntarikṣalokaḥ prāṇo'sau lokaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1255: trayo vedā eta eva vāgevargvedo mano yajurvedaḥ prāṇaḥ sāmavedaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1257: devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā eta eva vāgeva devā manaḥ pitaraḥ prāṇo manuṣyāḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1259: pitā mātā prajaita eva mana eva pitā vāṅgmātā prāṇaḥ prajā
GV03sb_14_u:1261: vijñātam vijijñāsyam avijñātameta eva yatkiṃ ca vijñātam vācastadrūpam vāgghi
GV03sb_14_u:1264: yatkiṃ ca vijijñāsyam manastadrūpam mano hi vijijñāsyam mana eva tadbhūtvāvati
GV03sb_14_u:1266: yatkiṃ cāvijñātam prāṇasya tadrūpam prāṇo hyavijñātaḥ prāṇa eva tadbhūtvāvati
GV03sb_14_u:1268: tasyai vācaḥ pṛthivī śarīram jyotī rūpamayamagnistadyāvatyeva vāktāvatī pṛthivī
GV03sb_14_u:1271: athaitasya manaso dyauḥ śarīraṃ jyotī rūpamasāvādityastadyāvadeva manastāvatī
GV03sb_14_u:1272: dyaustāvānasāvādityastau mithunaṃ samaitāṃ tataḥ prāṇo'jāyata sa indraḥ sa
GV03sb_14_u:1273: eṣo'sapatno dvitīyo vai sapatno nāsya sapatno bhavati ya evam veda
GV03sb_14_u:1275: athaitasya prāṇasyāpaḥ śarīraṃ jyotī rūpamasau candrastadyāvā neva prāṇastāvatya
GV03sb_14_u:1278: ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve'nantāḥ sa yo haitānantavata upāste'ntavataṃ sa lokaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1279: jayatyatha yo haitānanantānupāste'nantaṃ sa lokaṃ jayati
GV03sb_14_u:1281: sa eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakalastasya rātraya eva pañcadaśa kalā
GV03sb_14_u:1282: dhruvaivāsya ṣoḍaśī kalā sa rātribhirevā ca pūryate'pa ca kṣīyate so'māvāsyāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1283: rātrimetayā ṣoḍaśyā kalayā sarvamidam prāṇabhṛdanupraviśya tataḥ prātarjāyate
GV03sb_14_u:1284: tasmādetāṃ rātrim prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ na vicindyādapi kṛkalāsasyaitasyā eva devatāyā
GV03sb_14_u:1287: yo vai sa saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakalo'yameva sa yo'yamevaṃvitpuruṣastasya
GV03sb_14_u:1288: vittameva pañcadaśa kalā ātmaivāsya ṣoḍaśī kalā sa vittenaivā ca pūryate'pa ca
GV03sb_14_u:1289: kṣīyate tadetannabhyaṃ yadayamātmā pradhirvittaṃ tasmādyadyapi sarvajyāniṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1292: atha trayo vāva lokāḥ manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti so'yam manuṣyalokaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1293: putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā pitṛloko vidyayā devaloko devaloko vai lokānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1296: athātaḥ samprattiḥ yadā praiṣyanmanyate'tha putramāha tvam brahma tvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1297: yajñastvaṃ loka iti sa putraḥ pratyāhāham brahmāhaṃ yajño'haṃ loka iti
GV03sb_14_u:1299: yadvai kiṃ cānūktam tasya sarvasya brahmetyekatā ye vai ke ca yajñāsteṣāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1300: sarveṣāṃ yajña ityekatā ye vai ke ca lokāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ityekataitāvadvā idaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1303: saha putramāviśati sa yadyanena kiṃcidakṣṇayākṛtam bhavati tasmādenaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1304: sarvasmātputro muñcati tasmātputro nāma sa putreṇaivāsmiṃloke
GV03sb_14_u:1307: pṛthivyai cainamagneśca daivī vāgāviśati sā vai daivī vāgyayā yadyadeva vadati
GV03sb_14_u:1310: divaścainamādityācca daivam mana āviśati tadvai daivam mano yenānandyeva
GV03sb_14_u:1313: adbhyaścainaṃ candramasaśca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1314: saṃcaraṃścāsaṃcaraṃśca na vyathate'tho na riśyati sa eṣa evaṃvitsarveṣām
GV03sb_14_u:1315: bhūtānāmātmā bhavati yathaiṣā devataivaṃ sa yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_14_u:1316: bhūtānyavantyevaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti yadu kiṃ cemāḥ prajāḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1317: śocantyamaivāsāṃ tadbhavati puṇyamevāmuṃ gacati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacati
GV03sb_14_u:1319: athāto vratamīmāṃsā prajāpatirha karmāṇi sasṛje tāni sṛṣṭānyanyo'nyenāspardhanta
GV03sb_14_u:1323: tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme tānyāpnottānyāptvā mṛtyuravārunddha
GV03sb_14_u:1324: tasmācrāmyatyeva vākśrāmyati cakṣuḥ śrāmyati śrotramathemameva nāpnodyo'yam
GV03sb_14_u:1327: tāni jñātuṃ dadhrire 'yaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃścāsaṃcaraṃśca na
GV03sb_14_u:1328: vyathate'tho na riṣyati hantāsyaiva sarve rūpam bhavāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve
GV03sb_14_u:1329: rūpamabhavaṃstasmādeta etenākhyāyante prāṇā iti tena ha vāva tatkulamākhyāyate
GV03sb_14_u:1330: yasminkule bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya u haivaṃvidā spardhate'nuśuṣya haivāntato
GV03sb_14_u:1334: bhāsyāmyahamiti candramā evamanyā devatā yathādevataṃ sa yathaiṣām prāṇānām
GV03sb_14_u:1335: madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyurmlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1338: athaiṣa śloko bhavati yataścodeti sūryo'staṃ yatra ca gacatīti prāṇādvā eṣa udeti
GV03sb_14_u:1339: prāṇe'stameti taṃ devāścakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti yadvā
GV03sb_14_u:1342: caretsamāpipayiṣetteno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_14_u:1344: trayaṃ vā idaṃ nāma rūpaṃ karma teṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vāgityetadeṣāmukthamato hi
GV03sb_14_u:1348: atha rūpāṇām cakṣurityetadeṣāmukthamato hi sarvāṇi rūpāṇyuttiṣṭhantyetadeṣāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1349: sāmaitaddhi sarvai rūpaiḥ samametadeṣām brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi rūpāṇi bibharti
GV03sb_14_u:1351: atha karmaṇām ātmetyetadeṣāmukthamato hi sarvāṇi karmāṇyuttiṣṭhantyetadeṣāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1352: sāmaitaddhi sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ samametadeṣām brahmaitaddhi sarvāṇi karmāṇi
GV03sb_14_u:1353: bibharti tadetattrayaṃ sadekamayamātmātmo ekaḥ sannetattrayaṃ tadetadamṛtaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1354: satyena cannam prāṇo vā amṛtaṃ nāmarūpe satyaṃ tābhyāmayam prāṇaścannaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1356: dṛptabālākirhānūcāno gārgya āsa sa hovācājātaśatruṃ kāśyam brahma te bravāṇīti
GV03sb_14_u:1358: hovācājātaśatruḥ sahasrametasyāṃ vāci dadmo janako janaka iti vai janā dhāvantīti
GV03sb_14_u:1360: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāsāvāditye puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1361: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā atiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām mūrdhā
GV03sb_14_u:1362: rājeti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa yaetamevamupāste'tiṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām
GV03sb_14_u:1365: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāsau candre puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1366: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā bṛhanpāṇḍaravāsāḥ somo rājeti vā
GV03sb_14_u:1367: ahametamupāsa iti sa ya etamevamupāste'haraharha sutaḥ prasuto bhavati nāsyānnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1370: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ vidyuti puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1371: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāstejasvīti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1372: etamevamupāste tejasvī ha bhavati tejasvinī hāsya prajā bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:1374: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamākāśe puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1375: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pūrṇamapravartīti vā ahametamupāsa iti
GV03sb_14_u:1376: sa ya etamevamupāste pūryate prajayā paśubhirnāsyāsmāllokātprajodvartate
GV03sb_14_u:1378: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ vāyau puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1379: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā indro vaikuṇṭho'parājitā seneti vā
GV03sb_14_u:1380: ahametamupāsa iti sa ya etamevamupāste jiṣṇurhāparājiṣṇurbhavatyanyatastyajāyī
GV03sb_14_u:1382: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamagnau puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1383: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā viṣāsahiriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1384: etamevamupāste viṣāsahirha bhavati viṣāsahirhāsya prajā bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:1386: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamapsu puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1387: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhāḥ pratirūpa iti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1391: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyamādarśe puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1392: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā rociṣṇuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1393: etamevamupāste rociṣṇurha bhavati rociṣṇurhāsya prajā bhavatyatho yaiḥ saṃnigacati
GV03sb_14_u:1396: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ dikṣu puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1397: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā dvitīyo'napaga iti vā ahametamupāsa iti
GV03sb_14_u:1398: sa ya etamevamupāste dvitīyavānha bhavati nāsmādgaṇaścidyate
GV03sb_14_u:1400: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ yantam paścācabdo'nūdaityetamevāham brahmopāsa iti
GV03sb_14_u:1401: sa hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā asuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1402: etamevamupāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃloka āyureti nainam purā kālātprāṇo jahāti
GV03sb_14_u:1404: sa hovāca gārgyo ya evāyaṃ cāyāmayaḥ puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1405: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā mṛtyuriti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1406: etamevamupāste sarvaṃ haivāsmiṃloka āyureti nainam purā kālānmṛtyurāgacati
GV03sb_14_u:1408: sa hovāca gārgyo yaścāyamātmani puruṣa etamevāham brahmopāsa iti sa
GV03sb_14_u:1409: hovācājātaśatrurmā maitasmintsaṃvadiṣṭhā ātmanvīti vā ahametamupāsa iti sa ya
GV03sb_14_u:1410: etamevamupāsta ātmanvī ha bhavatyātmanvinī hāsya prajā bhavati sa ha tūṣṇīmāsa
GV03sb_14_u:1413: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ etāvannū3ityetāvaddhīti naitāvatā viditam bhavatīti sa hovāca
GV03sb_14_u:1416: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ pratilomaṃ vai tadyadbrāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyamupeyādbrahma me
GV03sb_14_u:1417: vakṣyatīti vyeva tvā jñapayiṣyāmīti tam pāṇāvādāyottasthau tau ha puruṣaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1419: rājanniti sa nottasthau tam pāṇināpeṣam bodhayāṃ cakāra sa hottasthau
GV03sb_14_u:1421: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ yatraiṣa etatsupto'bhūdya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣaḥ kvaiṣa
GV03sb_14_u:1422: tadābhūtkuta etadāgāditi tadu ha na mene gārgyaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1424: sa hovācājātaśatruḥ yatraiṣa etatsupto'bhūdya eṣa vijñānamayaḥ puruṣastadeṣām
GV03sb_14_u:1425: prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya ya eṣo'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmiñceti
GV03sb_14_u:1427: tāni yadā gṛhṇāti atha haitatpuruṣaḥ svapiti nāma tadgṛhīta eva prāṇo bhavati gṛhītā
GV03sb_14_u:1430: sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati te hāsya lokāstaduteva mahārājo bhavatyuteva
GV03sb_14_u:1433: sa yathā mahārājo jānapadāngṛhītvā sve janapade yathākāmam
GV03sb_14_u:1434: parivartetaivamevaiṣa etatprāṇāngṛhītvā sve śarīre yathākāmam parivartate
GV03sb_14_u:1436: atha yadā suṣupto bhavati yadā na kasya cana veda hitā nāma nāḍyo dvāsaptatiḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1437: sahasrāṇi hṛdayātpurītatamabhipratiṣṭhante tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete
GV03sb_14_u:1439: sa yathā kumāro vā mahābrāhmaṇo vā 'tighnīmānandasya gatvā śayītaivamevaiṣa
GV03sb_14_u:1443: vyuccarantyevamevāsmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi
GV03sb_14_u:1445: sarva eta ātmāno vyuccaranti tasyopaniṣatsatyasya satyamiti prāṇā vai satyaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1448: yo ha vai śiśuṃ sādhanaṃ sapratyādhānaṃ sasthūṇaṃ sadāmaṃ veda sapta ha dviṣato
GV03sb_14_u:1451: ayaṃ vāva śiśuryo'yam madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ tasyedamevādhānamidam pratyādhānam
GV03sb_14_u:1452: prāṇa sthūṇānnaṃ dāma tametāḥ saptākṣitaya upatiṣṭhante
GV03sb_14_u:1454: tadyā imā akṣaṃlohinyo rājayaḥ tābhirenaṃ rudro'nvāyatto'tha yā akṣannāpastābhiḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1455: parjanyo yā kanīnakā tayādityo yacuklaṃ tenāgniryatkṛṣṇaṃ tenendro'dharayainaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1456: vartanyā pṛthivyanvāyattā dyauruttarayā nāsyānnaṃ kṣīyate ya evaṃ veda
GV03sb_14_u:1458: tadeṣa śloko bhavati arvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhnastasminyaśo nihitaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:1459: viśvarūpam tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīre vāgaṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti
GV03sb_14_u:1461: arvāgbilaścamasa ūrdhvabudhna iti idaṃ tacira eṣa hyarvāgbilaścamasa
GV03sb_14_u:1462: ūrdhvabudhnastasminyaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpamiti prāṇā vai yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam
GV03sb_14_u:1463: prāṇānetadāha tasyāsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta tīra iti prāṇā vā ṛṣayaḥ prāṇānetadāha
GV03sb_14_u:1464: vāgaṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvidāneti vāgghyaṣṭamī brahmaṇā saṃvitte
GV03sb_14_u:1466: imāveva gotamabharadvājau ayameva gotamo'yam bharadvāja imāveva
GV03sb_14_u:1469: hyannamadyate'ttirha vai nāmaitadyadatririti sarvasyāttā bhavati sarvamasyānnam
GV03sb_14_u:1472: dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ caivāmūrtaṃ ca martyaṃ cāmṛtaṃ ca sthitaṃ ca yacca
GV03sb_14_u:1477: tasyaitasya mūrtasyaitasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso ya eṣa tapati
GV03sb_14_u:1482: tasyaitasyāmūrtasya etasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso ya eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:1488: tasyaitasya mūrtasya etasya martyasyaitasya sthitasyaitasya sata eṣa raso yaccakṣuḥ
GV03sb_14_u:1493: tasyaitasyāmūrtasya etasyāmṛtasyaitasya yata etasya tyasyaiṣa raso yo'yaṃ

GV03sb_14_u:3012: ādade punarmāmaitvindriyam punasteja punarbhagaḥ punaragnayo dhiṣṇyā
GV03sb_14_u:3017: atha yadyudaka ātmānam paśyet tadabhimantrayeta mayi teja indriyaṃ yaśo
GV03sb_14_u:3022: cedasmai naiva dadyātkāmamenāṃ yaṣṭyā vā pāṇinā vopahatyātikrāmedindriyeṇa te
GV03sb_14_u:3023: yaśasā yaśa ādada ityayaśā eva bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:3025: sa yāmicet kāmayeta meti tasyāmarthaṃ niṣṭhāpya mukhena mukhaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3026: saṃdhāyopasthamasyā abhimṛśya japedaṅgātsambhavasi hṛdayādadhi jāyase sa
GV03sb_14_u:3029: atha yāmicet na garbhaṃ dadhīteti tasyāmarthaṃ niṣṭhāpya mukhena mukhaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3030: saṃdhāyābhiprāṇyāpānyādindriyeṇa te retasā reta ādada ityaretā eva bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:3032: atha yāmicet garbhaṃ dadhīteti tasyāmarthaṃ niṣṭhāpya mukhena mukhaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3033: saṃdhāyāpānyābhiprāṇyādindriyeṇa te retasā reta ādadhāmīti garbhiṇyeva bhavati
GV03sb_14_u:3035: atha yasya jāyāyai jāraḥ syāt taṃ ceddviṣyādāmapātre'gnimupasamādhāya pratilomaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3036: śarabarhi stīrtvā tasminnetāstisraḥ śarabhṛṣṭhīḥ pratilomāḥ sarpiṣāttkā
GV03sb_14_u:3037: juhuyānmama samiddhe'hauṣīrāśāparākāśau ta ādade'sāviti nāma gṛhṇāti mama
GV03sb_14_u:3038: samiddhe'hauṣīḥ putrapaśūṃsta ādade'sāviti nāma gṛhṇāti mama samiddhe'hauṣīḥ
GV03sb_14_u:3039: prāṇāpānau ta ādade'sāviti nāma gṛhṇāti sa vā eṣa nirindriyo visukṛdasmāllokātpraiti
GV03sb_14_u:3040: yamevaṃvidbrāhmaṇaḥ śapati tasmādevaṃvicrotriyasya jāyāyā upahāsaṃ neceduta
GV03sb_14_u:3043: atha yasya jāyāmārtavaṃ vindet tryahaṃ kaṃse na pibedahatavāsā naināṃ vṛṣalo na
GV03sb_14_u:3046: sa ya icet putro me gauro jāyeta vedamanubruvīta sarvamāyuriyāditi kṣīraudanam
GV03sb_14_u:3049: atha ya icet putro me kapilaḥ piṅgalo jāyeta dvau vedāvanubruvīta sarvamāyuriyāditi
GV03sb_14_u:3052: atha ya icet putro me śyāmo lohitākṣo jāyeta trīnvedānanubruvīta
GV03sb_14_u:3055: atha ya icet duhitā me paṇḍitā jāyeta sarvamāyuriyāditi tilaudanam pācayitvā>
GV03sb_14_u:3057: atha ya icet putro me paṇḍito vijigīthaḥ samitiṃgamaḥ śūśrūṣitāṃ vācam bhāṣitā
GV03sb_14_u:3062: svāhānumataye svāhā devāya savitre satyaprasavāya svāheti hutvoddhṛtya prāśnāti
GV03sb_14_u:3063: prāśyetarasyāḥ prayacati prakṣālya pāṇī udapātram pūrayitvā tenaināṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3064: trirabhyukṣatyutiṣṭhāto viśvāvaso'nyāmica prapharvyam saṃ jāyām pratyā saheti
GV03sb_14_u:3066: athaināmabhipadyate amo'hamasmi sā tvaṃ sā tvamasyamo ahaṃ sāmāhamasmi
GV03sb_14_u:3067: ṛktvaṃ dyauraham pṛthivī tvam tāvehi saṃrabhāvahai saha reto dadhāvahai puṃse
GV03sb_14_u:3070: athāsyā ūrū vihāpayati vijihīthāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī iti tasyāmarthaṃ niṣṭhāpya mukhena
GV03sb_14_u:3071: mukhaṃ saṃdhāya trirenāmanulomāmanumārṣṭi viṣṇuryoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā
GV03sb_14_u:3072: rūpāṇi piṃśatu āsiñcatu prajāpatirdhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli
GV03sb_14_u:3073: garbhaṃ dhehi pṛthuṣṭuke garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāvādhattām puṣkarasrajau
GV03sb_14_u:3075: hiraṇyayī araṇī yābhyāṃ nirmanthatāmaśvinau devau taṃ te garbhaṃ dadhāmahe
GV03sb_14_u:3076: daśame māsi sūtave yathāgnigarbhā pṛthivī yathā dyaurindreṇa garbhiṇī vāyurdiśāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3077: yathā garbha evaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi te'sāviti nāma gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_14_u:3079: soṣyantīmadbhirabhyukṣati yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīṃ samīṅgayati sarvataḥ evā te
GV03sb_14_u:3080: garbha ejatu sahāvaitu jarāyuṇā indrasyāyaṃ vrajaḥ kṛtaḥ sārgaḍaḥ sapariśrayaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:3083: jāte'gnimupasamādhāya aṅka ādhāya kaṃse pṛṣadājyamānīya pṛṣadājyasyopaghātaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3084: juhotyasmintsahasram puṣyāsamedhamānaḥ svagṛhe asyopasadyām mā caitsītprajayā
GV03sb_14_u:3085: ca paśubhiśca svāhā mayi prāṇāṃstvayi manasā juhomi svāhā
GV03sb_14_u:3090: athāsyāyuṣyaṃ karoti dakṣiṇaṃ karṇamabhinidhāya vāgvāgiti trirathāsya
GV03sb_14_u:3091: nāmadheyaṃ karoti vedo'sīti tadasyaitadguhyameva nāma syādatha dadhi madhu
GV03sb_14_u:3092: ghṛtaṃ saṃsṛjyānantarhitena jātarūpeṇa prāśayati bhūstvayi dadhāmi bhuvastvayi
GV03sb_14_u:3093: dadhāmi bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ sarvaṃ tvayi dadhāmīti
GV03sb_14_u:3095: athainamabhimṛśati aśmā bhava paraśurbhava hiraṇyamasrutam bhava ātmā vai
GV03sb_14_u:3098: athāsya mātaramabhimantrayate iḍāsi maitrāvaruṇī vīre vīramajījanathāḥ sā tvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3101: athainam mātre pradāya stanam prayacati yaste stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūryo
GV03sb_14_u:3102: ratnadhā vasuvidyaḥ sudatraḥ yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tamiha dhātave
GV03sb_14_u:3105: taṃ vā etamāhuḥ atipitā batābhūratipitāmaho batābhūḥ paramām bata kāṣṭhām prāpa
GV03sb_14_u:3106: śriyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃvido brāhmaṇasya putro jāyata iti
GV03sb_14_u:3140: yājñavalkyenākhyāyante maṇā hyeṣa tejasā saha payaso reta ābhṛtamiti payaso
GV03sb_14_u:3145: athāto dakṣiṇānām suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ śatamānam brahmaṇe dadātyāsīno vai brahmā
GV03sb_14_u:3146: yaśaḥ śayānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ tasmātsuvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ śatamānam brahmaṇe dadāti
GV03sb_14_u:3148: atha yaiṣā gharmadughā tāmadhvaryave dadāti tapta-iva vai
GV03sb_14_u:3151: atha yaiṣā yajamānasya vratadughā tāṃ hotre dadāti yajño vai hotā yajño
GV03sb_14_u:3154: atha yaiṣā patnyai vratadughā tāmudgātṛbhyo dadāti patnīkarmeva vā ete'tra
GV03sb_14_u:3157: athaitadvai āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūte bhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:3160: sarveṣām vā eṣa bhūtānām sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā yadyajñastasya samṛddhimanu
GV03sb_14_u:3161: yajamānaḥ prajayā paśubhirṛdhyate vi vā eṣa prajayā paśubhirṛdhyate yasya gharmo
GV03sb_14_u:3164: pūrṇāhutiṃ juhoti sarvam vai pūrṇaṃ sarveṇaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca vivṛḍhaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3167: svāhā prāṇebhyaḥ sādhipatikebhya iti mano vai prāṇānāmadhipatirmanasi hi sarve
GV03sb_14_u:3168: prāṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca vivṛḍhaṃ yajñasya
GV03sb_14_u:3170: pṛthivyai svāheti pṛthivī vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3176: antarikṣāya svāheti antarikṣam vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3185: sūryāya svāheti sūryo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā
GV03sb_14_u:3188: digbhyaḥ svāheti diśo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3191: candrāya svāheti candro vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā
GV03sb_14_u:3194: nakṣatrebhyaḥ svāheti nakṣatrāṇi vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmāyatanaṃ

GV03sb_14_u:3200: varuṇāya svāheti varuṇo vai sarveṣāṃ devānāmātmā

GV03sb_14_u:3206: trayodaśaitā āhutayo bhavanti trayodaśa vai māsāḥ samvatsarasya samvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:3209: vāce svāheti mukhamevāsminnetaddadhāti prāṇāya svāhā prāṇāya svāheti nāsike
GV03sb_14_u:3210: evāsminnetaddadhāti cakṣuṣe svāhā cakṣuṣe svāhetyakṣiṇī evāsminnetaddadhāti

GV03sb_14_u:3214: pūrṇāhutimuttamāṃ juhoti sarvam vai pūrṇaṃ sarveṇaivaitadbhiṣajyati yatkiṃ ca
GV03sb_14_u:3217: manasaḥ kāmamākūtimiti manasā vā idaṃ sarvamāptaṃ tanmanasaivaitadbhiṣajyati

GV03sb_14_u:3221: vivṛḍhaṃ yajñasya paśūnāṃ rūpamannasya raso yaśaḥ śrīḥ śrayatām mayi
GV03sb_14_u:3224: atha taṃ copaśayāṃ ca piṣṭvā mārtsnayā mṛdā saṃsṛjyāvṛtā karotyāvṛtā
